summary: Ever wonder where the pilgrims and students stayed after doing the 7000 steps ? [color=#FF0000]Hrothgar Sanctuary[/color] is a revamp of my [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10516]Old Hrothgar[/url] mod . Changes include 2 new Initiate Merchants, Improved lighting, Greybeards Elixir and mountain water and more.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#FF0000]Hrothgar Sanctuary[/color] is a revamp of my [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10516]Old Hrothgar[/url] 
Many changes and features including:
2 new Initiate Merchants who are being schooled in the Way of the Voice
Improved lighting
Greybeards Elixir and mountain water in food group. 
5 leveled items in the Lower level footlockers.
Improved Navmesh for followers
3 hard to find disenchant-able items.
2 sets of playable, enchantable Greybeards light armor gear
5 Mannikins
Labeled Storage chests , crates and barrels.
Numerous other changes that I failed to document as I worked on them, usually in the wee hours of the morning. :)
==========
If you use this or any other mod.... please endorse them. Especially NMM. It is amazing how many downloads that file has and how few endorsements it has. An endorsement is the easiest way to let a mod author know that you appreciate the work they have done.
==========
Your recommendations and feedback are appreciated... 
==========
Your uploaded Pictures earn Kudos from me.
==========
Authors mods :
__ [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8677]Landscaped Player Homes[/url]
__ [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11985]Jordis Room Fix[/url]
==========
Recommended mods:
= = Forthcoming shortly.
author: Ohiogramps

files.name: Hrothgar Sanctuary
files.changelogHtml:
Added 2 New Vendors Initiates who live and work in the sanctuary.
All containers are now non-respawning.
Light armor rated Greybeard Outfit ( 3 pieces) added
Increased the lighting in the sanctuary
5 leveled items are situated in the lower level footlockers
Lower Vendor sells the enhanced water items There are still a couple of freebies in the barrels.
Adjusted Vendor Chests and AI packages
Added an inaccessable door for future ruins developement.
Reworked the exit navmesh to make it easier for followers.
Changed the name of the file.
Added three hard to find disenchantable items into the My Favorite items chest.
Added 4 pieces of enchanted Crafting Clothing.
Extra set of Dovakhiin Greybeard Set added to My Favorite items chest ( for when your enchanting skills increase)
